title: Create a Migration for an Nx Plugin
description: Create a Migration for an Nx Plugin.

examples.description: Adds a new migration inside `my-plugin`, which will be triggered when migrating to version 1.0.0 or above from a previous version.

path.description: The file path to the migration without the file extension (e.g. `my-plugin/src/migrations/my-migration` generates the file `my-plugin/src/migrations/my-migration.ts`). Relative to the current working directory.
path.x-prompt: What is the migration file path?

name.description: The migration name to export in the plugin migrations collection.

packageVersion.description: Version to use for the migration.
packageVersion.x-prompt: What version would you like to use for the migration?

packageJsonUpdates.description: Whether or not to include `package.json` updates.

skipLintChecks.description: Do not eslint configuration for plugin json files.
